languages.text: "Знает ли элантах, что ты думаешь о {mf|его|ее} решениях? О, я вижу. Тебе не хватает смелости высказать все {mf|ему|ей} в лицо. И ты выбрал иную жертву. Но мне безразлична гниль твоих слов".

traits.locale_text: "Знает ли элантах, что ты думаешь о {mf|его|ее} решениях? О, я вижу. Тебе не хватает смелости высказать все {mf|ему|ей} в лицо. И ты выбрал иную жертву. Но мне безразлична гниль твоих слов".

languages.text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."
languages.original_text: "Знает ли элантах, что ты думаешь о {mf|его|ее} решениях? О, я вижу. Тебе не хватает смелости высказать все {mf|ему|ей} в лицо. И ты выбрал иную жертву. Но мне безразлична гниль твоих слов".

traits.locale_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to tell it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

"Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

"Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

"Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

languages.text: 「エランタは、{mf|彼|彼女}の決断についてお前がどう思っているかを知っているのか？ああ、なるほど。面と向かって言う勇気がないから、別のターゲットを選んだわけだ。だがな、そんな言葉の腐臭など、私にはどうでもいい」
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタは、{mf|彼|彼女}の決断についてお前がどう思っているかを知っているのか？ああ、なるほど。面と向かって言う勇気がないから、別のターゲットを選んだわけだ。だがな、そんな言葉の腐臭など、私にはどうでもいい」

languages.text: "Weiß der Elantach, was Ihr von {mf|seinen|ihren} Entscheidungen haltet? Ah. Euch fehlt der Mut, es {mf|ihm|ihr} ins Gesicht zu sagen, darum habt Ihr eine andere Beute gewählt. Mir kann die Fäulnis Eurer Worte jedoch nichts anhaben."
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: "Weiß der Elantach, was Ihr von {mf|seinen|ihren} Entscheidungen haltet? Ah. Euch fehlt der Mut, es {mf|ihm|ihr} ins Gesicht zu sagen, darum habt Ihr eine andere Beute gewählt. Mir kann die Fäulnis Eurer Worte jedoch nichts anhaben."

languages.text: « L'elantach sait-{mf|il|elle} ce que vous pensez de sa décision ? Oh, je vois. Vous n'avez pas le courage de lui exprimer le fond de votre pensée, c'est pourquoi vous avez choisi une autre cible. Mais la mesquinerie de vos propos me laisse indifférente. »
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: « L'elantach sait-{mf|il|elle} ce que vous pensez de sa décision ? Oh, je vois. Vous n'avez pas le courage de lui exprimer le fond de votre pensée, c'est pourquoi vous avez choisi une autre cible. Mais la mesquinerie de vos propos me laisse indifférente. »

languages.text: «¿Sabe {mf|el|la} elantach lo que opinas de sus decisiones? Oh, ya veo. No tienes el coraje necesario para decírselo a la cara, por eso has escogido una presa distinta. Pero soy inmune a la ponzoña de tus palabras».
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe {mf|el|la} elantach lo que opinas de sus decisiones? Oh, ya veo. No tienes el coraje necesario para decírselo a la cara, por eso has escogido una presa distinta. Pero soy inmune a la ponzoña de tus palabras».

languages.text: “外界人知道你对{mf|他|她}的选择有什么看法吗？噢，我明白了，你没有勇气当着{mf|他|她}的面说出来，所以你打算把这些话说给别人听。不过，我根本不在意你的废话。”
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: “外界人知道你对{mf|他|她}的选择有什么看法吗？噢，我明白了，你没有勇气当着{mf|他|她}的面说出来，所以你打算把这些话说给别人听。不过，我根本不在意你的废话。”

languages.text: "Elantach'ın bundan haberi var mı? Tabii ya... Yüzüne söyleyecek cesaret sende ne arar? Gücün ancak bana yetiyor. Zehirli sözlerin bana vız gelip tırıs gider."
languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach'ın bundan haberi var mı? Tabii ya... Yüzüne söyleyecek cesaret sende ne arar? Gücün ancak bana yetiyor. Zehirli sözlerin vız gelir tırıs gider."

languages.original_text: "Does the elantach know what you think of {mf|his|her} decisions? Oh, I see. You lack the courage to say it to {mf|his|her} face, so you have chosen a different quarry. But I am indifferent to the rot of your words."
